item.title: Bangalore to Ghati Subramanya Trip Plan
item.description: One day trip from Bangalore to Ghati Subramanya, If you are Solo riding on a MotorBike or You are a Family driving in a Car, then this plan works very well to cover places in Ghati Subramanya. Ghati Subramanya is an ancient Hindu temple, 50 kms away from Bangalore towards Doddaballapur situated on the outskirts of Bangalore. Ghati Subramanya has a recorded history of
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
